message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.AR, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper deals with distributed storage systems and caching frameworks. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also likely as the paper discusses optimizing the placement of file chunks on servers and access probabilities of file requests, which can be seen as a control problem. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is relevant as the paper mentions the use of maximal-distance-separable (MDS) erasure codes, which is a concept from information theory. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is less likely but still possible as the paper may discuss the hardware architecture of the storage system. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is also less likely but possible as the paper may discuss the computational complexity of the proposed algorithm.
